name: Himantolo
description:
Summary
A girl was hospitalized with a head injury in the accident.
Her friend comes to the hospital to care for her, but the friend vanishes sometime that night.
The girl has to find her missing friend by searching the hospital.

Features
  • Fearful graphics: Monochrome dot graphics will evoke feelings of fear and oddity.
  • Simple puzzle: There are several puzzles to solve throughout the game.
  • Multiple Ending: Your choices determine the ending result. There are three endings.
  • Various Characters: You will interact with variety of inpatients on the 7th floor.
  • Simple system: You can play using only screens and item clicks.
